description: "Rick Francois" engraved on patch box; silver moon inlaid next to patch box; ebony and ivory inlay where stock meets neck; flint wrapped in leather; trigger plate very plain and matte; ebony and ivory inlaid in a star and oval shape on PL stock; "RFW" engraved on neck, "L. Page Jimtown 1993" engraved on top of barrel; little elf-man inlaid in silver on comb
medium: Curly maple, iron, steel, silver, ebony, ivory
title: Pennsylvania-style (Lehigh c. 1800) Flintlock Longrifle
